entries.text: （初见） Hello-o? Can you her me? Help me! I'm stuck. Hello? Please! Anyone! …… …… Oh my stars I'm so happy to see you! I am Alexander, also Known as the Iron Fist. And as you can see, I'm stock here. Please, can you help me out of this? …… ……

（帮助） Put those doubts to rest, I'll be just fine. I'm very well trained. Gice it your all, I say! Ouuch! Ahhh! Ahh! Well played, good sir. Well Played！ Through that mighty wallop of your almost spelt the end of me!
